channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged tags

item.title: Is there a way to edit tags in questions other than your own?
item.description: A lot of people seem to forget to add a tag for the authoring system they're using. With enough reputation points you can edit the question text, but it seems that you can't add or edit tags. Is it possible and if not could the feature be added?

item.title: Can we add explanations to individual tags?
item.description:
Problem: I see questions here tagged with "Squiffy", but I don't even know what "squiffy" is.

Is there some way to add an explanation to the tags? I would like it if I could hover over tags like on stackoverflow, but if there's no support for that then maybe we should just start adding questions like "What is xxx?" or "Explain the tag xxx"?

item.title: What is the tag for textadventures.co.uk?
item.description: I would like to know what tag is used for games created with the online creator/editor at textadventures.co.uk. Thanks, Lewis.

item.title: Is "plot-explanation" the right tag? What have you learned about the plot of Terminator that you didn't know before from reading this question?
item.description:
Is plot-explanation an apt tag for question below:

Previous discussion
http://ifanswers.com/114/in-terminator-are-the-crew-real-or-a-fantasy

dannii: I'm unable to make a question that links to your comment.

juhanna: Sorry! I'm unable to reply to your comment. I'm unable to make a comment on that post.
